//
//   float4x4 Transform;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name         Reg   Size
//   ------------ ----- ----
//   Transform    c6       4
//

    vs_3_0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_texcoord v1
    dcl_color v2
    dcl_color1 v3
    dcl_texcoord o0.xy
    dcl_texcoord1 o1
    dcl_texcoord2 o2
    dcl_texcoord3 o3
    dcl_position o4

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0.xy, v1
    mov o1, v2
    mov o2, v3
    mul r0, c7, v0.y
    mad r0, c6, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, v0.z, r0
    mad r0, c9, v0.w, r0

mov o4, r0 // Relocated from line 34 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 5CF48237.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o3, r0

//     mov o4, r0 // Relocated to line 33 with shadertool.py

// approximately 9 instruction slots used
